billing.defaultLocation 137
Must be the ID of the location (Health Facility) where Billing is being used.
billing.primaryIdentifierType 3
Must be the ID of a Patient Identifier Type. Newly created patients will have an identifier of this type added to them.
billing.otherIdentifierTypes
Optionally other patient identifier types that should can be searched on and displayed on the patient page. This should be a comma-separated list of patient identifier ids.
billing.healthFacilityName
This should be the name of The Health Facility that will be displayed to Printed Out docs
billing.healthFacilityPhysicalAddress
This should be the Physical Address (P.O. Box or Others) of The Health Facility that will be displayed to Printed Out docs
billing.healthFacilityShortCode
This should be the Short Code of The Health Facility that will be displayed to Printed Out docs
billing.healthFacilityEmail
This should be the E-Mail address of The Health Facility that will be displayed to Printed Out docs
billing.healthFacilityLogo
This should be the Logo location (full file path: e.g. /usr/share/tomcat6/.OpenMRS/mohbranding/images/chub_logo.jpg) of The Health Facility that will be displayed to Printed Out docs
billing.tarrif.act act
This should be the categories in which tariff are provided at the high level (acts and pharmacy)
billing.tarrif.pharmacy pharmacy
This should be the categories in which tariff are provided at the high level (acts and pharmacy)
